meanings.definition: A type of decorative embroidery stitch resembling a feather.
meanings.sent1: She learned to create a beautiful featherstitch on her embroidery.
meanings.sent2: The featherstitch added a lovely touch to the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to mimic the featherstitch with its tail.
meanings.sent4: Her delicate featherstitch floated across the fabric like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The intricate featherstitch looked like tiny feathers scattered on the cloth.

meanings.sent1: She decided to featherstitch the edges of the fabric for a neat finish.
meanings.sent2: He carefully featherstitched the hem of the dress.
meanings.sent3: The tailor featherstitched so fast, it seemed like magic.
meanings.sent4: Her words featherstitch the hearts of those who listen.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic sound of the needle featherstitching was soothing.
